author: Simon Difford
description: Navy rum and triple sec add special interest to this Daiquiri.
name: Charles Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
